version_description:
- Black Friday is here, take advantage of our exceptional offers!
- New leagues, huge loot, diamonds galore in case of victory and victorious defense, discover our new league. Do not forget to subscribe.
- fixed video slow motion bug on connection and in the chat room
- game rebalancing

- Santa Claus is comming, check to see if a strange cactus appears.
- Take advantage of the Christmas period to make your purchases all the packs are doubled for 4 days!
- the bellows comes out of its hiding place automatically after two stars
- small improvements
- The clan war is here (beta version)! Choose your team and prepare for battle!
